overview_of_class: This course, required of all second year MTS and TSB Ph.D. students, is a practicum focused on professional practices for communication academics and individual consultations on the development of a publishable piece of research.
name: The Practice of Scholarship
title: SoC MTS 503-0-20 The Practice of Scholarship
